note: I am that same Shig who was in the world in those days. (Click here for OIP)

fields.name: Favorite Hobby
fields.value: Replaying old conversations in my head, and winning them this time.

fields.name: Notable Achievement
fields.value: Before I turned 50, I had recorded as many Hot 100 #1 hits as Bruce Springsteen.

fields.name: Out-Survivals
fields.value: Elvis Presley, Michael Jackson, George Michael, Curly Howard
